p: Our forecasting target is the aggregate flu data from ILINet, the CDC national sentinel surveillance system [ 37]. ILINet tracks weekly counts of patients seeking care for influenza-like-illness, as reported by a sample of health-care providers throughout the US. We obtained national reports between 10/03/1997 and 05/16/2014 from CDC FluView website [ 12]. We report results on forecasting national-scale ILINet in our main text, and report several state-level forecasts for comparison in Table in S1 Table.
